settings.content:
About Paxton's Cheese Club

Step into a world of exquisite flavors with Paxton's Cheese Club. As a member, you'll receive exclusive access to a carefully curated selection of artisanal cheeses from across the globe, handpicked for their exceptional quality and distinctive character. Delivered right to your doorstep, each cheese comes with detailed tasting notes, serving suggestions, and the fascinating stories behind their origins. Expand your palate, indulge in the finest flavours, and elevate your cheese experience with Paxton's Cheese Club.

If you enjoy good cheese and want to explore the breath of cheeses available in the UK & Europe, join Paxton's Cheese Club or equally purchase as a gift for a foodie & cheese lover. As a member of this artisan cheese subscription, you receive four carefully selected cheeses paired with Artisan Biscuits for Cheese and detailed tasting notes. We guarantee that you will not receive the same cheese in a two year period.

Select from a:

  • 3-month (Bronze)
  • 6-month (Silver)
  • 12-month (Gold)
  • Luxury Hamper & 12 months (Platinum) subscription.

Prefer not to commit to a monthly subscription? We can deliver cheese every other month or every quarter. We also cater to preferences for no blue cheese, no goat cheese, and can accommodate pregnancy-safe and gluten-free dietary requirements.

When you purchase our Cheese Club subscription online, you'll receive an immediate, personalised Cheese Club welcome email so it's also perfect for a last minute gift!

settings.title: British Wholesale Cheese for Export
settings.content:
Paxton & Whitfield is recognised around the world as a purveyor of the very best of British cheese and fine foods. We have been the Royal Cheesemongers since 1850 and our branded products are designed to tell this story.

We can work with your business to supply you the highest quality cheese, fine foods and cheese-related homewares which will bring a little slice of St James’s into your range!

Our wholesale team will train your staff – from around the world if necessary – so that they know the fascinating story of our company and have knowledge about the products they are selling.

settings.title: Wholesale cheese for hotels, restaurants and caterers
settings.content:
From our sites in London, Bath and the Cotswolds, we supply many of the finest hotels, restaurants, bakeries and cafes.

Our cheese list supports indie British cheesemakers; including several smaller artisan dairies and we also stock excellent examples of Continental favourites. We offer fast delivery and a personal service.

Whether you're a small independent business or part of a major group, we can be relied upon to bring you the very best quality British and Continental cheese in the quantities you require at a time that's convenient to you.

Each monthly Cheese Club box is accompanied by printed tasting notes and a video from one of our expert cheesemongers talking you through each of the cheeses in your box. Here's a short snippet from our July Cheese Club video with Jazz, our Quality Manager at our HQ.

settings.question: What cheese can we have?
settings.answer:
Four, specially-selected artisan cheeses.

Including first tastes of exclusive cheeses from our maturation rooms, our cheesemonger favourites and hard-to-find cheeses from artisan cheesemakers in the UK and across the continent.

Each cheese is freshly cut and hand-wrapped in our specialist Paxton & Whitfield biodegradable waxed paper. Cheese Club members will not receive a repeated cheese within at least 24 months.

settings.question: What's included in the subscription?
settings.answer:
• Four specially selected artisan cheeses. Each cheese is freshly cut and hand-wrapped in our specialist Paxton & Whitfield biodegradable waxed paper. Cheese Club members will not receive a repeated cheese within at least 24 months.
  • Paxton & Whitfield Artisan Biscuits for Cheese. A box of biscuits to enjoy with your cheese.  Each one hand-baked by our small UK bakeries, with a variety of flavours to explore for perfect pairings.
  • A Paxton & Whitfield tasting notes card. Containing fascinating information about each of the cheeses - with space to add notes about your favourites to keep for future reference.
  • A specially-recorded video by one of our expert cheesemongers which talks you through each of the cheeses in the selection. This will be sent via email so that you can enjoy it whilst tasting your cheese, or you can watch it to whet your appetite whilst your cheese is on the way.

settings.question: When I sign up, what happens?
settings.answer:
You will receive a personalised welcome letter immediately after placing your order which you can print or email to your gift recipient.

You will then be added our next month's deliveries (we send on specific dates - see dates here).

If this isn't suitable, please give us a call and we can move this to a different month for you.

settings.question: What dates do you send on?
settings.answer:
Please see our list of 2024 dates here for Cheese Club.

Please note, we cannot change the date of the delivery, to ensure that you receive the best quality cheese that we bring in specially for our Cheese Club. We can postpone to the next month or change addresses if you are not at home with notice.

settings.question: I'm buying Cheese Club as a gift.
settings.answer:
If you are planning to buy Cheese Club as a gift, you can either put full recipient details – and they will be emailed immediately the Cheese Club welcome email, or alternatively, if you need to sent as a later date, you can pop in your own details and forward to recipient.

Please ensure that you update the details on Cheese Club to ensure that the recipent recieves the cheese and the monthly information going forward, you can either do this in your account or alternatively, email cheeseclub@paxtonandwhitfield.co.uk to update these details.

settings.question: What happens on delivery day?
settings.answer:
Sent on a fresh overnight, carbon-neutral delivery in a Paxton & Whitfield branded transit box - insulated with Woolcool; a revolutionary, totally compostable and biodegradable insulation and chilled with fully recyclable and re-usable ice packs.

Our courier, DPD, will contact the recipient with a one-hour delivery slot when each delivery is on the way.

settings.question: How do I care for the cheese?
I have dietary requirements or preferences, what are my options?
settings.answer:
We understand everyone has preferences! Whether you're a no blue or not goat's cheese, we can accommodate you, simply select your preference when on our Cheese Club products. Need pregnancy safe or gluten free? Contact us on cheeseclub@paxtonandwhitfield.co.uk and we can organise this for you.

Unfortunately, we cannot accommodate any other dietary requirements.

settings.question: I don't want cheese every month, are there other options?
settings.answer: Of course, simply sign up for alternate or quarterly deliveries on our Cheese Club products, or alternatively, call or email our customer service team.

settings.question: I need to change the date of my delivery.
settings.answer:
Please give us as much time as possible, and we can of course skip a delivery or change the delivery address for you. Please call or email us here.
Unfortunately, if it is the day before, we won't be able to accommodate any changes.
